thread.title: magical Paris in full blossom
thread.title_full: magical Paris in full blossom - Review of Saint James Paris - Relais et Chateaux, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Anielhe
title: magical Paris in full blossom
text: the decor and history of this place make it an unforgettable experience. great restaurant and unique bibliotheque bar are a must. it's a great place in Paris to get away from Paris > once inside you feel like in a chateau in wilderness. superb for quick recap and relaxation. definitely book in advance
